casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
STEVENSON S251071 Supreme Court of California. NOVEMBER 14, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petitions for review are granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition in a related issue in People v. Canizales, S221958 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of *663the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
